mods.railcraft.api.core.items

Interface ITrackItem


  • public interface ITrackItem
    Should be implemented by any rail item class that wishes to have it's rails placed by for example the Tunnel Bore or Track Relayer. If you defined your rails with a TrackSpec, you don't need to worry about this.
    Author:
    CovertJaguar

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getPlacedBlockId()
      Return the block id of a placed track.
      boolean isPlacedTileEntity(ItemStack stack, TileEntity tile)
      Return true if the given tile entity corresponds to this Track item.
      boolean placeTrack(ItemStack stack, World world, int i, int j, int k)
      Attempts to place a track.

        Parameters:

        i - x-Coord

        k - z-Coord

      • isPlacedTileEntity

        boolean isPlacedTileEntity(ItemStack stack,
                         TileEntity tile)
        Return true if the given tile entity corresponds to this Track item. If the track has no tile entity, return true on null.

        stack -
        tile -
        Returns:
